questions.Q1: Is MONITORED SCENARIO a similar scenario compared with EXISTING TEST CASES?
questions.Q2: Does MONITORED SCENARIO cover more lines or branches than EXISTING TEST CASES?
questions.Q3: Will FUNCTION CANDIDATE work differently when executed under MONITORED SCENARIO?
questions.Q4: Does FUNCTION CANDIDATE still produce correct results when executed under MONITORED SCENARIO?
questions.Q5: Will MONITORED SCENARIO reveal any bug in FUNCTION CANDIDATE?

task: Given a FUNCTION CANDIDATE and a MONITORED SCENARIO, you should answer all questions in QUESTIONS. For each question, you should answer only YES or NO. Return results in a JSON dictionary, where the key is the question key and the value is the answer.
